Ken! I did not join the US universities that offered adm=
ission because: 
1. I did not get any financial aid before hand
2. The univ=
ersities were not good enough to be worth taking the risk of
bearing the ex=
penses of the first semester (or two) and hoping for aid
later. 
3. I did n=
ot get the visa in time to join the university :(

So, now my plan of actio=
n is to, first, do a Masters (Research Oriented)
from a European country (w=
here there's no tuition fee), and then think about
PhD later. This will add=
: 1. A masters degree & 2. Hopefully, research
paper(s) that I can put in m=
y CV for the PhD application. 

I have applied in France through this "Stud=
y in France" program that we have
by our government in collaboration with t=
he French Embassy. 

Wish me luck! And yes any tips/guidance in this regard=
 will be highly
appreciated :)

Regards,
Umer Iqbal

eristy that reviews some NE research
including NEAT.  The paper is written =
in French.  It is credited to:

Stephane Doncieux
Universite Pierre et Mari=

hing would be.

ken
